description: Updates documentation impacted by behavior, config, and release changes.

Update only what changed:
- Add-on `README.md` for user-facing behavior/config changes
- `config.yaml` option documentation alignment
- Add-on `CHANGELOG.md` entries when applicable

Keep wording concise and technically accurate.
